body_html:
Note that the GPU utilization shown by nvidia-smi might be inaccurate as during the model running, there might be dynamic device memory being allocated so the peak utilization might be larger. Also, like @ppwwyyxx mentioned, several other issues might affect the performance.

I will close this issue due to the inactive status. Please feel free to reopen this if you have more insights/code to share. I'd be happy to take a look once more detailed information is provided.

body:
Note that the GPU utilization shown by nvidia-smi might be inaccurate as during the model running, there might be dynamic device memory being allocated so the peak utilization might be larger. Also, like @ppwwyyxx mentioned, several other issues might affect the performance.

I will close this issue due to the inactive status. Please feel free to reopen this if you have more insights/code to share. I'd be happy to take a look once more detailed information is provided.
